column4: hi all. can someone help me with networking? i have an install of ubuntu, but can't ping the gateway... or anything..... i *think* everything is setup right, but obviously something is off, because it doesn't work...
ip address, broadcast, gateway are right, and routes are added
multiple times, epinky, router checked too
is there ping on your ethernet address?
what's its name, I mean eth0 , eth1, ath0?
then it sounds to me like a damaged NIC ... really odd
works in my other ubuntu install, and in windows
no idea man, if it pings eth0 then it's not about drivers neither kernel side
